name: Natasha
message: Designate a Parent Line and manage allowed numbers, minutes, messages, and downloads for all lines on your account.

allowance.title: Minutes
allowance.suheading: View and set calling allowances on managed lines for the current billing cycle.

alerts.desc: This will disable calls for this line until you set the limit above 0. Always Allowed numbers can still be reached. two lines of content
You have reached or exceeded your total allowance set.

allowance.title: Messages
allowance.suheading: View and set calling allowances on managed lines for the current billing cycle.

alerts.desc: Messaging will be blocked for this line until you set the allowance above 0. Always Allowed numbers can still be reached.
You have exceeded your total message allowance.

allowance.title: Downloads
allowance.suheading: View and set calling allowances on managed lines for the current billing cycle.

alerts.desc: This line has no allowance set, meaning that this line's user can download without restrictions.

changes.desc: Whenever minutes changed from 500 to No Allowance
Whenever minutes changed from 500 to No Allowance
Whenever minutes changed from 500 to No Allowance
Whenever minutes changed from 500 to No Allowance
Whenever minutes changed from 500 to No Allowance
